data.title: Kendrick Perkins top 5 best co-stars on championship teams in NBA History: 1. Scottie Pippen to Michael Jordan 2. Kobe Bryant to Shaq 3....
data.meta_description:
982 likes, 191 comments - mambabasketball24 on May 25, 2024: "Kendrick Perkins top 5 best co-stars on championship teams in NBA History:

1. Scottie Pippen to Michael Jordan
2. Kobe Bryant to Shaq
3. Stephen Curry to Kevin Durant
4. Kevin McHale to Larry Bird 
5. Kyrie Irving to LeBron James
